title: Virtual Administrative Assistant (VAA)
job_overview:

This role is perfect for a detail-oriented, proactive professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment.

Duties/Responsibilities

--Sales Support--
Monitor active/pre-listing properties; coordinate photography, staging, and inspections.
Ensure all listing docs are compliant, organized in OneDrive, and tracked in CRM/MLS.
Manage communication between agents, sellers, and transaction coordinators.

--Daily Tasks--
Upload/organize digital files; update CRM records; respond to emails within 24 hours.
Prepare RFA forms, track milestones, and audit folders for accuracy.

--Weekly Workflow--
Process weekend documents (Monday), audit files (Friday), and attend Thursday ZooUpgrade to see actual infoetings.

--Ongoing--
Maintain CRM/Mailchimp databases; track listings, referrals, and donations.

**Qualifications
--Real estate/transaction coordination experience (preferred).
--Expert in Buffini, OneDrive, CRMs, and Microsoft Office.
--Hyper-organized, communicative, and deadline-driven.

Hours: 20 hrs/week (10 am - 2 pm PST, Mon-Fri).
